page.title: 15Sutton Barton Country Club
page.content: This is a farm building which has had numerous extensions and has been converted into a very popular wining and dining rendevous. There are rooms for functions as wel as the normal bar and dining facilities. Outside catering is a newly added speciality and the owners appear to be very enterprising. Lawns have been constructed for putting, croquet and merely lying on to relax and take in the view. The club is reached from the Colyton to Honiton road down a very narrow unclassified road leading to Northleigh. To find the club a series of arrows have been added at the road side giving directions to this club built on a very isolated site.
